AuthorizationFormDataUse.name: AuthorizationFormDataUse
AuthorizationFormDataUse.description: Represents the data use consented to in an authorization form.

AuthorizationFormId.description: Required. The ID of the associated authorization form record.

DataUsePurposeId.description: Required. Identifies the data use purpose record associated with the authorization form.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Required. The name of the authorization form data use.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of the account associated with this customer.
